scripts.create: export STAGE=development; aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name buynow-api --template-body file://api.yml --parameters ParameterKey=DeploymentStage,ParameterValue=$STAGE ParameterKey=Timestamp,ParameterValue=$TIMESTAMP --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM && aws cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name buynow-api
scripts.update: export STAGE=development TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s); aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name buynow-api --template-body file://api.yml --parameters ParameterKey=DeploymentStage,ParameterValue=$STAGE ParameterKey=TimeStamp,ParameterValue=$TIMESTAMP --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM && aws cloudformation wait stack-update-complete --stack-name buynow-api
scripts.build: aws cloudformation package --template-file User/Post/user-post.yml --s3-bucket mktapp.beta.cloudformation.us-east-1 --output-template-file templates/user-post.yaml && aws cloudformation package --template-file User/Get/user-get.yml --s3-bucket mktapp.beta.cloudformation.us-east-1 --output-template-file templates/user-get.yaml && npm run prep
